alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 8:02PM CST until March 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi...Louisiana... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson, Concordia and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY, MARCH 25... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...Until Friday, March 25. * IMPACTS...At 48.0 feet, Carthage Point Road becomes impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 48.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and crest at 49.0 feet Saturday, March 19. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 48.0 Wed 7 pm CST 48.2 48.3 48.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 800 AM CST.
